name: Shipwrecked Siren
description:
In the depths of the ocean, you can barely imagine what awakens...

WARNINGS:  Strong language, violence and gore.

With a whopping 18 endings, explore life as a mermaid who has stumbled across a small group of fisherman off the coast of Australia.

::some voicing still in progress.  we recommend downloading again when it's all up to date::
